post_text: We are so very thankful to the community for their support. As a result of the community's support of Measure CK, we were able to hold a Ribbon Cutting Ceremony today to dedicate the new Tommye D. Warner Annex on the Valley View Community School Campus. This new building and adjacent play structure was designed to benefit the Santa Clarita Valley's medically fragile students as well as all 3rd-6th grade students at Valley View Community School.
